title: DevOps Engineer
description:
DevCore Solutions is Hiring a DevOps Engineer (Full-Time)

DevCore Solutions, an Amsterdam-based tech firm, optimizes development pipelines for clients in tech and finance. We’re seeking a DevOps Engineer to enhance our CI/CD processes.

About the Role
You’ll build and manage CI/CD pipelines for efficient software delivery.

Your Tasks

  • Build CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins.
    - Automate infrastructure with Terraform.
    - Monitor systems with Prometheus.
    - Collaborate for code quality.
    - Implement security practices.
    - Optimize pipeline performance.
    - Stay updated on DevOps trends.
    - Support client deployments.
    - Conduct system audits.
    - Share team best practices.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 2–3 years of experience in DevOps, proficient in Jenkins, Terraform, or GitLab. Cloud platform knowledge and automation skills are essential. A Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field is required.

Why DevCore?
We’re innovators in DevOps. Our hybrid work model and training support growth in a collaborative environment.

Perks
Health insurance
Pension
25 days of annual leave
Training budget
DevOps tools access
Team events

Apply Now
Join DevCore Solutions to optimize development. Submit your application today!

#DevCoreCareers #DevOps #HiringNow
